en-US.name: SKILL_NAME
en-US.summary: Classic Movie Musts on Alexa - listen to all the episodes and play a fun trivia game inspired by the show.
en-US.description:
Listen to your favorite movie podcast and test your knowledge of classic movies.

Classic Movie Musts asks you questions based on the Classic Movie Must podcast (https://www.classicmoviemusts.com/)

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Classic Movie Musts" or "Alexa, open Classic Movie Musts" - you can then play trivia, play the latest episode, or listen to an episode by name ("play rear window").

At anytime, you can exit by saying "Alexa, stop"
en-US.updatesDescription: Clearer, more complete description and updated skill category

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Launch the skill and say play trivia to answer questions. Answer as many as you like.

You can also listen to the latest podcast by saying play latest or a specific podcast by saying 'play rear window'
